tasks.title: Phase 1: Core Sui Infrastructure

tasks.details: Explore repositories, verify functionality with CLI/curl, and update sui-docs.

tasks.title: Phase 2: Major DeFi Protocols

tasks.title: Phase 5: Practical Examples & ID Resolution
